label.phrase: if a person can only be guided or saved by a government official avalokitesvara bodhisattva shall manifest as a government official to explain the dharma to him if a person can only be guided or saved by a king of ghosts avalokitesvara bodhisattva shall manifest as a king of ghosts to explain the dharma to him if a person can only be guided or saved by embracing another religion avalokitesvara bodhisattva shall manifest as a person of that same religion to explain the dharma to him

clusterList.phrase: if a person can only be guided or saved by a government official avalokitesvara bodhisattva shall manifest as a government official to explain the dharma to him if a person can only be guided or saved by a king of ghosts avalokitesvara bodhisattva shall manifest as a king of ghosts to explain the dharma to him if a person can only be guided or saved by embracing another religion avalokitesvara bodhisattva shall manifest as a person of that same religion to explain the dharma to him
